short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a random TIL fact from Reddit when you open a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension displays a random "Today I Learned" (TIL) fact from the popular social news aggregation website, Reddit, every time a new tab is opened in Chrome. The TIL fact is displayed in a box in the center of the page, and if the original Reddit post has an associated image, that image is used as the background image for the new tab page.
